index.infoSection:
# By students, for students. Free & Open Source.
TUfast is the #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden.
For two years, we have been working with you and the FSRs to develop the perfect product to make your everyday study life easier.

Find out more about the project on this site and install TUfast now!

sections: TUfast was released in May 2020, is [open-source](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD),  developed by students and has 2500+ users as of 01.01.2022. For two years, we have been working with you and the FSRs to develop the perfect product to make your everyday student life easier.
We currently aim to provide TUfast for 5000 users at TU Dresden and to make it available for an additional university in Saxony.

# What does TUfast do?
TUfast provides a number of features to make your everyday studies easier, such as:

- AutoLogin to all TU Dresden online portals
 - Quick access and hotkeys for essential online portals
 - Supports SELMA, OPAL, jExam and many more
 - Overview of all your OPAL courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself.
 - ... and many more that you can discover in TUfast ;)
TUfast has been reported to **save 2000 Clicks and 90 minutes per semester!**

# Is TUfast secure?
 The TUfast extension stores user data only locally on your PC. If you uninstall the extension, all data will be deleted as well. Because security is important to us, TUfast is also currently being audited by the department of IT security of TU Dresden. Here you can find our [privacy policy](/datenschutz).

# Further information
 The project is being supported by:

- Mrs. Jantos (coordinator eLearning) and Mr. Jantos (product manager of SELMA)
